title: 296 - Chicago Karl
description:
Are you aware of the actions you take and the decisions you make every day? Are you aware of the type of daily example you set for yourself and others? In this episode, the guys discuss the importance of your grind and daily behaviors. On any given day, we make hundreds or even thousands of decisions. These daily decisions can mess us up and delay progression if we aren’t careful. Additionally, we are being watched. A lot of motivation can come from people who observe our daily actions. Whether it’s kids, spouses, or co-workers, can the people that watch you count on you to be that leader by example?
 Listener Perks 
  
ORGANIFI is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime, anywhere while on the go.
 
HELLO FRESH Get fresh pre-measured ingredients delivered to your door with Hello Fresh. Go to www.Hellofresh.com/success14 and use the Promo Code “SUCCESS14” to get 14 FREE Meals and FREE shipping.

  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embody the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.
